qas.question: In what year did the earthquake in Sichuan occur?
How many people were killed as a result?
What year did the Sichuan earthquake take place?
What day did the earthquake occur?
What time of the day did the quake happen?

context: The <a0_0><a3_0>2008<a3_0/><a0_0/> Sichuan earthquake or <a1_0>the Great Sichuan earthquake<a1_0/>, measured at <a4_0>8.0 Ms and 7.9 Mw<a4_0/>, and occurred at <a6_0>02:28:01 PM China Standard Time<a6_0/> at epicenter (06:28:01 UTC) on <a5_0>May 12<a5_0/> in Sichuan province, killed <a2_0><a7_0>69,197<a7_0/><a2_0/> people and left 18,222 missing.
